page.title: 10Lifestyles. Family Sunday
page.content: My name is Lorraine Byrne from Chepstow in Gwent.My family consists of me,mum,dad and my two sisters Susan and Amanda.On Sunday morning my family and I go to my aunt's,but we do not have lunch there.We go home at 12.00 & have lunch at 13.00.I help my mum wash up and then we go to the market.I usually buy something.The market packs up at 16.00,then we go home and have some tea.After tea we take my sister to her friend's then come back and take the dogs for a walk in the woods. The dogs love it.Sometimes my dad and mum pick flowers.When it gets dark we go home and watch T.V. If we are hungry we have some supper. I go to bed at 21.00 because it is school the next day.
